alert.note: Alert for Amador; El Dorado; Sacramento (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 9:25PM PST until January 15 at 5:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in California... Cosumnes River At Michigan Bar affecting El Dorado, Amador and Sacramento Counties. .Heavy rainfall has produced a significant rise on the Cosumnes River. The Cosumnes River at Michigan Bar is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight. For the Cosumnes River...including Michigan Bar, McConnell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cosumnes River at Michigan Bar. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water flows on to the road near Wilton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM PST Saturday the stage was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...Forecast to fluctuate near 11.5 FT into just after midnight tonight then forecast to rise to near 12.0 FT late tonight then forecast to recede to near 8.5 FT late tomorrow evening. * Impact...Near 8.0 feet, Low lying lands along the river begin to flood. Near 13.2 feet, Water floods houses in Wilton. The south bank levee near Wilton is overtopped. Near 12.0 feet, Water flows on to the road near Wilton. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. For more hydrologic information and stage definitions refer to the following web site: wrh.noaa.gov/sto/hydro_data.php The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 930 AM PST.
